title: Georgia Senate 2026 - Day 5 AM Session 1
summary:
Here is a structured markdown summary of the Georgia Senate 2026 - Day 5 AM Session 1 transcript:

**Overview**
The session featured the introduction of several new bills, including SB 170. There was a brief discussion and unanimous consent to excuse certain senators, as well as the opening prayer and pledge of allegiance.

**Key Actions**
**SB 170**: No details provided on this bill.

**Bills Introduced (First Reading)**
- SB 401: Amend Part 14 of Article 6 of Chapter 2 of Title 20 related to other educational programs under the Quality Basic Education.
- SB 402: Amend Chapter 5 of Title 49.
- SB 403: Amend Article 5 of Chapter 12. 
- SB 404: Amend Article 1 of Chapter 9 in Title 9.
- SB 405: Amend Code Section 15-10-2.
- SB 406: Amend Title 4-3.
- SB 407: Provide for a homestead exemption from Cherokee County School District ad valorem taxes.
- SB 408: Amend an unspecified section.
- SB 409: Unspecified subject relating to insurance and labor.
- SB 410: Amend Part 1 of Article 1 of an unspecified section.
- SR 579: Honor the life of Sergeant Major Transportation.

**Notable Moments**
- The Senate President welcomed a group of young girls who accompanied a senator.
- There was a brief discussion about dispensing with the reading of the journal, which was ultimately done by unanimous consent.
- Announcements were made about upcoming opportunities for new committee chairmanships.
- A new senator led the chamber in the pledge of allegiance and introduction of the pastor of the day.

**Votes**
No recorded votes mentioned.

**Attendance**
The Senate President recognized and excused several senators who were absent.

**Adjournment**
The transcript does not indicate when the session was adjourned or when the next session will take place.
